Description: Child's leather shoe, elaborate. Made from three pieces, sole, front upper with long pointed tongue and rear upper with back flap and integral ties. Edging strip around the rear upper sewn with 5-ply flax.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), B1-12 room 2 floor 3
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
